CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from DCB solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 , which is almost two orders higher than that of P1 ( the hole mobility of pure P1 film is 2 × 10^-5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material being referred to, which is a type of polymer film.
2. P1: This is another name for a material, which is likely a different type of polymer film.

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. P1
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT
2. P1

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| P1 |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from DCB solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 , which is almost two orders higher than that of P1 ( the hole mobility of pure P1 film is 2 × 10^-5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material or substance being studied, which is a type of polymer film.
2. DCB: This is an abbreviation for something, possibly the solvent or solution used to cast the PSFDTBT film.
3. P1: This is another abbreviation for a material or substance, which is likely a reference to a pure polymer film.

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. DCB
3. P1
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material or substance being studied, which refers to its material property of being a type of polymer film.
2. hole mobility: This is a material property that refers to the ability of holes (electrons) to move through the material.
3. on/off ratios: This is a material property that refers to the ratio of the amount of material that is "on" (conducting) to the amount that is "off" (non-conducting).

So, the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties are:

1. PSFDTBT
2. hole mobility
3. on/off ratios

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| hole mobility |
| on/off ratios |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobility of the pristine PSFDTBT film spin - cast from DCB solution is 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 with on / off ratios in the order of 10^5 , which is almost two orders higher than that of P1 ( the hole mobility of pure P1 film is 2 × 10^-5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ).

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Mobility: This is the value of the mobility of the PSFDTBT film, which is given as 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1.
2. On/Off ratios: This is the value of the on/off ratios of the PSFDTBT film, which is given as 10^5.
3. P1: This is the value of the mobility of the pure P1 film, which is given as 2 × 10^-5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

Mobility (7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1)
On/Off ratios (10^5)
P1 (mobility of pure P1 film: 2 × 10^-5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. Mobility: This is the value of the mobility of the PSFDTBT film, which is given as 7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1.
2. On/Off ratios: This is the value of the on/off ratios of the PSFDTBT film, which is given as 10^5.

So, the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

Mobility (7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1)
On/Off ratios (10^5)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| --- |
| Mobility (7.26 × 10^-3 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1) |
